question: Identify the major product Y in the following reaction sequence:
Phenol $\xrightarrow{NaOH}$ A $\xrightarrow[(ii)H^+]{(i)CO_2}$ B $\xrightarrow[(ii)H^+]{(i)(CH_3CO)_2O}$ Y
explanation: 3. Salicylic acid + Acetic anhydride ($(CH_3CO)_2O$) $\rightarrow$ Acetylsalicylic acid, which is Aspirin (Y).
